content.question: Which of the following best explains an implication of the authorâ€™s argument as it relates to the Mexican state?

choices.label: Pluralism in Mexico will bring about more coalition governments.
Pluralism in Mexico will be beneficial to wealthier citizens and businesses.
Pluralism in Mexico will promote competition among groups not linked to the state.
Pluralism in Mexico will create political pressure for democratization.

content.answer: Pluralism in Mexico will promote competition among groups not linked to the state.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain how the implications of the author's argument or perspective may affect political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
